statements: SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level, last_interaction_date FROM customer_engagement ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'Low' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, engagement_level, last_interaction_date FROM customer_engagement WHERE last_interaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customer_engagement WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_engagement WHERE last_interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY last_interaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_engagement;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, engagement_level FROM customer_engagement WHERE engagement_level IN ('High', 'Medium') ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_groups WHERE group_id = 2;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM customer_groups;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE engagement_level = 'High';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE engagement_level = 'Low';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE engagement_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE engagement_level = 'High' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM customer_groups WHERE group_name LIKE '%Important%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM customers WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, product_name FROM customers c JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, cg.group_name FROM customers c JOIN products p ON c.customer_id = p.product_id JOIN customer_groups cg ON c.engagement_level = cg.group_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM Customers ORDER BY engagement_level DESC;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM Customers WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_id, p.purchase_date FROM Customers c JOIN ProductPurchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT cg.group_name, COUNT(cgm.customer_id) AS member_count FROM CustomerGroups cg LEFT JOIN CustomerGroupMapping cgm ON cg.group_id = cgm.group_id GROUP BY cg.group_name;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, engagement_level FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1001;

SELECT Customers.customer_id, Customers.customer_name, CustomerGroups.group_name FROM Customers JOIN CustomerGroupMapping ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerGroupMapping.customer_id JOIN CustomerGroups ON CustomerGroupMapping.group_id = CustomerGroups.group_id;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, ProductPurchases.product_id, ProductPurchases.purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN ProductPurchases ON Customers.customer_id = ProductPurchases.customer_id WHERE Customers.engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY ProductPurchases.purchase_date DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, COUNT(ProductPurchases.product_id) AS total_purchases FROM Customers LEFT JOIN ProductPurchases ON Customers.customer_id = ProductPurchases.customer_id GROUP BY Customers.customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 0 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY last_contacted DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score FROM engagement_scores WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM customer_segments;
SELECT * FROM customer_contacts ORDER BY last_contacted DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.email, p.purchase_date, p.amount FROM customer_contacts c INNER JOIN purchase_history p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 1000 ORDER BY p.amount DESC;

SELECT e.customer_id, e.engagement_score, e.last_updated, c.email FROM engagement_scores e INNER JOIN customer_contacts c ON e.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE e.engagement_score < 50 AND last_updated > '2021-01-01';

SELECT c.customer_id, s.segment_name, s.description FROM customer_segments s INNER JOIN customer_assignment a ON s.segment_id = a.segment_id INNER JOIN customer_contacts c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.segment_name = 'VIP';
